name: Getting work and being in work

tasks.name: I’m unemployed and trying to find work

subtasks.name: What kind of job could I do? (skills, interests, pay, location)

needs.1: I need to what locations are feasible for me to consider for work?
needs.2: What kind of work will support my mental wellbeing (for people with depression, anxiety etc.)

subtasks.name: I need to make sure that getting a job is financially viable for me

needs.1: I need to understand how much money I will take home from a new job
needs.2: I need to understand what this will mean for my benefits entitlements (how much money I will have each week/fortnight/month)
needs.3: I need to ensure I can afford to live (including any childcare and other costs required if working) once I have a job
needs.4: I need to transition from ESA to JSA

subtasks.name: I’m searching for a job that suits my requirements

needs.1: I need job that suits my skills and experience
needs.2: I need a job in a location that is feasible for me to travel to
needs.3: I need a job that matches the hours I’m able to work
needs.4: I need a job that meets my financial requirements

subtasks.name: I’m trying to make myself more employable

needs.1: I’m considering further training and education to make me more employable
needs.2: I’m considering volunteering to make me more employable

tasks.name: I’m applying for and trying to get a job

subtasks.name: I’m applying for jobs

needs.1: I need to create a CV and/or portfolio
needs.2: I’m trying to write cover letters that will help me to get a job
needs.3: I’m filling in job application forms
needs.4: I’m keeping track of all the applications I’ve made

subtasks.name: I’m interviewing and trying out for jobs

needs.1: I’m preparing for an interview
needs.2: I’ve had an interview that seemed unfair
needs.3: I’ve been asked to do a trial shift, I want to know what is reasonable for an employer to request
needs.4: I’m preparing to do a trial shift

subtasks.name: I am being not successful in getting a job

needs.1: I’m dealing with not getting the job I really wanted
needs.2: I’m dealing with not getting a job after applying for loads of them

subtasks.name: I’ve been offered a job and I need to negotiate pay and terms

needs.1: I’m anxious about negotiating the best pay I can get for my job
needs.2: I don’t know what I’m legally entitled to
needs.3: I don’t know what I can ask for
needs.4: I don’t know what is industry standard rates/terms
needs.5: I want to negotiate a package that will give me the best financial outcome

subtasks.name: I’m dealing with contracts and administration related to starting a new job

needs.1: I have to sign a contract for my job and need help to make sense of it
needs.2: I have to provide information to my new employer before I start work
needs.3: I have to prove who that I am who I say I am to my new employer
needs.4: Does my tax code change because I have a new job?
needs.5: How do I confirm that I am on the right tax code now?
needs.6: What benefits or entitlements do I have as a result of my new job? (includes both tax related and benefits related)
needs.7: How do I ensure that I am claiming the benefits I am entitled to and nothing I am not entitled to so that I have the most money to live on but incur a penalty later.

subtasks.name: I need to organise my life around my new job

needs.1: I need to plan how I will travel to and from work
needs.2: I need to organise childcare that works logistically with my new job

subtasks.name: I’m anxious about starting my new job

needs.1: I’m nervous about meeting lots of new people that I’ll be working with
needs.2: I’m anxious that I won’t be able to do my job well
needs.3: I’m anxious about understanding the technology in my new job
needs.4: I’m anxious that I won’t be able to do everything I need to do in the time allowed.

subtasks.name: I’m having trouble managing my workload

needs.1: I’m struggling to get a good work/life balance
needs.2: I’m having trouble managing deadlines

subtasks.name: My workplace and work practices are not safe

needs.1: I’m being asked to work in an environment that is not safe and I don’t know what to do
needs.2: I’m being asked to work in a way that is not safe and I don’t know what to do

subtasks.name: I’m having trouble with a colleague

needs.1: I’m being harassed or bullied by a colleague

subtasks.name: I’m not being treated fairly at work

needs.1: I’m being treated less well because of my age/gender/race/religion etc. (workplace discrimination)
needs.2: I’m not being paid what I’m entitled to

subtasks.name: I’m having trouble with my work hours

needs.1: It is difficult for me to plan my life and know what money I’ll have to live on because my work hours (and pay) are always changing.

subtasks.name: I’m being disciplined
